import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
source.6a4ea6f4:
sns.set_style('whitegrid')
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 5))
sns.barplot(x=total_spent_money.index, y = total_spent_money.values, palette='Blues')
plt.title('Total amount spent(in lakhs) by frenchises', fontsize=15)
plt.ylabel('Anount in lakhs')
